description:
Join our team as an Executive Support Specialist, providing high-level assistance to department chairs, deans, or the Chief Administrative Officer (CAO).

In This Role, You Will

  • Perform complex professional and analytical duties under general direction
  • Assist department directors and senior management with staff support
  • Conduct special studies and assignments on various administrative and operational topics
  • Prepare and present effective written reports and recommendations to senior management
  • Handle department-wide, cross-departmental, and major financial impact projects
  • Apply a thorough understanding of policies, procedures, and management analysis techniques

If you have a strong grasp of administrative concepts and techniques, and are skilled in management analysis, this position offers an exciting opportunity to make a significant impact.

Salary: $31.20- $49.77 hourly
